title: Fork, ca. 1675–1700
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Long three-tined fork, (replacement). Thin tubular stem. Pistol-shaped ivory handle with beaded cresting upper edge, faceted panel opposite; gilded bolster.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1675–1700.
ca. 1675–1700. ivory, steel, gold (?). The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-152.
